# A2B Corporation
A secure shipping company that delivers mass amounts of cargo from point A to point B securely, known very well for delivering mass amounts of cargo safely throughout charted space without breaking it. It is the youngest faction founded in 2501.
## History A2B was founded in 2501 by Krazk-Ieks after a cryo-frozen cake shipped to his girlfriend in the core worlds ended up delivered completely destroyed.
